name: Brenda Coultas
bio: Brenda Coultas is the author of the poetry collections A Journal of Places (online, Metambesen Press, 2015), The Tatters (Wesleyan University Press, 2014), The Marvelous Bones of Time (Coffee House Press, 2007), and A Handmade Museum (Coffee House Press, 2003). Her poetry can be found in anthologies, including Readings in Contemporary Poetry: An Anthology (2017), What is Poetry (Just Kidding, I Know You Know): Interviews from the Poetry Project Newsletter (1983-2009) (2017), and Symmetries: Three Years of Art and Poetry at Dominique Levy (2017).
